attributes.action: ban the automatic increase of credit card limits without the card holder actively seeking it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Credit card companies regularly increase the credit limit on their products without the consent of their customers.

This petition seeks to ban the
- increase of credit card limits without the card holders permission.
- a ban on credit card companies asking if they want an increase so that  holders must seek out an increase on their own accord without persuasion to giver permission

Often the increase will be made in advance of the card holder recieving a letter confirming the increase has taken place. This is unacceptable and encourages consumers to overspend what they do not have
